Description: MIJ, made in japan, Gibson, Lespaul, White, SG, Höfner, Duesenberg, Ibanez, ATELIER Z, ARIA, ESP, Caparison, Killer, COMBAT GUITARS, GUYATONE, Greco, Sugi Guitars, TEISCO, DEVISERA, Nil, Bacchus, VANZANDT, Fernandes, Fender Japan, Fujigen, MOON GUITARS, momose, Yairi Guitar, YAMAHA, TOKAI, Zemaitis, VOX, B, C, Rich, Epiphone, Gibson, Gretsch, Suhr, Schecter, Charvel, Jackson, Dean, Tom Anderson, Fender, Paul Reed Smith, Melancon, Mosrite, Rickenbacker, Robert Benedetto, Washburn, Ibanez, kramer, EDWARDS, Burny, Grassroots, 1987 Burny FERNANDES RSG-60 '63 Reissue/BL Deep Joint ~ All Original ~ Excellent++ condition.Made in Japan Down from here, Photo is dent and scratches etc.. About scratches that are hard to see. To make it easy to understand the condition of the scratches, I lighted the light strongly. 1987 Burny FERNANDES RSG-60 '63 Reissue/BL Deep Joint ~ All Original ~ Excellent++ condition.Made in Japan Body Mahogany, Deep Joint. Neck Mahogany. Frets 22F. Scale 24.75inch (628mm) Gibson Medium Scale. Nut Width About 1.69 inch (43mm). Pickup VH-3. Control 2 Volume, 2 Tone, 3-Way PU Toggle switch. Bridge Tune O Machic. Stop Tailpiece. Machine Heads Burny Fernandes Original. Color Black. Weight About 5.84 Pound ( 2.65 Kg ). This is Used Guitar. I was shooting a lot of photos. Please confirm with a photograph. My first impression is " Is this made in recent years ? " . But it is obviously different from Burny which was made in recent years. Particularly shining metal parts made me misunderstand. This RSG keeps a state of miracles. PRE-LOVED. I heard the details from former owner. Former owner is woman. After purchasing, she stopped practicing guitar in about a month. She lamented that guitar playing was difficult. That was in 1987. Later, she lost interest in the guitar.... And SG went to the warehouse. Therefore Long time, It has not been used. This SG was sleep in warehouse !! It about 30 years. Thanks to that, Condition is Excellent !! This SG was manufactured 30 years ago. Although it is an old guitar, I think that the scratch is little. I can say that this guitar is not used much. The evidence is the amount of frets remaining. The remaining amount of the Frets is so many. It might be exaggerated, but ...I can not think that this SG was manufactured 30 years ago. I assert that this SG is a Miracle Excellent++ condition. About guitar play, Current state, the space between the strings and the frets is standard. The Frets remaining amount are so many. Thanks to that, I feel very easy to play the guitar. You can play the guitar with a light touch. The accuracy of the product is high. This SG is deep joint. Therefore Un pluged sound is very powerful. You can feel vibrations transmitted to the body. The Pickups is original installed Fernandes VH-3. It sounds very similar to VH-1. This VH-3 Pickup is excellence. I feel a good Over drive and a good Distortion sound. Of course, the clean sound is also wonderful. Vintage Burny is Great !! In 2018, it will be over in a little while. I want to enjoy an auction. Therefore I will start this auction from $10. Everyone please enjoy !! (^.^)/ It is cleanliness. I polished with guitar exclusive polish, so it is in a very clean state. I after the finger board cleaning, painted beeswax. The aim is moisturizing and and protection. Current neck condition, very good ! roughly straight ! There is no problem with the Truss rod and it can be adjusted. Remaining the frets are 98% on average. You can play immediately after it is delivered to you. I was set new strings. Regular tuning. ( Inch : 009, 011, 016, 024, 032, 042 ) All is working well. It is in a very good condition. The Truss rod Wrench is not included. All Original.Note : The Lock nut and the Whammy bar are not original. The GIG BAG Included. Look at the photos, please verify by yourself! It will be professionally pack. Double air packing. And ships inside a sturdy cardboard box. This electric guitar is USED.
